author: theneedledrop
description:
LIST WEEK 2025 RAGES ON with a bunch of banger EPs. They're sorted below alphabetically with links to reviews and to listen. Enjoy!

And Beyond - If Only You Knew
Listen: https://music.apple.com/us/album/if-only-you-knew/1830894961

Car Bomb - Tiles Whisper Dreams
Listen: https://carbomb.bandcamp.com/album/tiles-whisper-dreams-ep

Clover-Lynn - Gothic Mountain Bluegrass
Listen: https://clover-lynn.bandcamp.com/album/gothic-mountain-bluegrass

Deki Alem - Forget in Mass
Listen: https://deki.bandcamp.com/album/forget-in-mass

Dog Race - Return the Day
Listen: https://dograceband.bandcamp.com/album/return-the-day

Ethel Cain - Perverts
Listen: https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/perverts-ethel-cain/n62i45gncv6ib
Review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VG022d0Zz3g

G Jones & Eprom - Disk Utility
Listen: https://eprom.bandcamp.com/album/disk-utility

Gabriel Jacoby - gutta child
Listen: https://gabrieljacoby.bandcamp.com/album/gutta-child
Review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mwfKnLS_D1M
title: Top 15 EPs of 2025
